cause.description:
charity: water is a quickly growing grass-roots initiative based in New York City that began work in August 2006.
100% of your public donations go DIRECTLY to build wells and other clean water solutions. charity: water's administrative costs are covered by its board and private donors.
Any individual can run their own fundraising campaign to benefit charity: water at mycharitywater.org - 100% of donations go to water projects and we prove every project we build by marking it on Google Maps.
official site at www.charitywater.org www.twitter.com/charitywater www.facebook.com/charitywater
1. www.charitywater.org
cause.mission: charity: water is a non-profit organization bringing clean and safe drinking water to people in developing nations. www.charitywater.org
